full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thank you for getting onto that! I can still see the thumbnails are quite varied. We would like everything to be straight and the thumbnails to be the same size.

I have attached these screenshots and added straight lines. Essentially we would like everything to be parallel top and bottom.

I hope that makes sense,

Kind regards,

Hollie.

full_threads.body:
Dear WP Perk Support,


I am writing from Kiss Goodbye to MS. We recently updated our Ambassador page and included our new Ambassador Monique. Since uploading her profile the icons on the webpage are very messy. Is this able to be fixed please?


https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/ambassadors/


Please let me know if you need anything from me to help.


Kind regards,
Hollie.
